name: Even The Devil Must Die
description:
"Even The Devil Must Die" Author: Mark Hancox ©2003. Updated 2020 by catventure.

It is an offline downloadable game.

This adventure game is text only and of the traditional sort. It is similar to the old Infocom/Magnetic Scrolls/Level 9 type which were popular in the mid 1980`s.

It is also similar to popular 80's 8-bit text adventures created with the QUILL, PAW or GAC adventure utilities.

There are no pictures or animations in this game. There is background music which can be turned on or off.
(Music credit: courtesy of Eric Matyas - soundimage.org)

As an agent for Death PLC you have been hired to assassinate the Devil himself!
Can you complete the mission?

The game was made using the free TAB retro text adventure and interactive fiction maker for Windows. More information about that and download here:
http://tab.thinbasic.com
